name: anaheim
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] (also Anaheim pepper, Anaheim chile) a long, thin, green pepper (= a vegetable with a hollow centre) from the USU.S. that does not have a very hot taste: I have lots of Anaheims in my freezer at the moment. I tried stuffing Anaheim peppers with fried rice and beans.
a city in the western US state of California: She is a mother of three boys from Anaheim, California.
More examplesFewer examplesThe Anaheims are very mild, but the other peppers in the recipe provide the heat.I added some roasted chopped Anaheim peppers to the guacamole.If very hot peppers are not to your taste, consider using Anaheims instead.
